title.rendered: White & Grey Non Padding Jacket For Women

excerpt.rendered:
• Windproof rating: 25 PSI minimum after 20 launderings.
  • Breathability: 750-800 g/m²/24 hours average.
  • Attached, adjustable hood (stowable in collar).
  • Stand up collar for extra warmth.
  • Full zip closure with zipper garage at top.
  • Long sleeves.
  • Elastic cuffs for a secure fit.
  • Cinch cord at hem to help keep the heat in and the elements out.
  • Large slant pockets at front with full zip closure and zipper garages.
  • Straight hemline.
  • Printed taffeta lining on select colors.
  • Shell: 100% polyester;
    Upper Body Lining: 100% polyester;
    Hood & Lower Body Lining: 100% nylon;
    Sleeve Lining: 100% nylon.
  • Machine wash, tumble dry.
